H0.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Joaquin Phoenix

H1.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Reese Witherspoon

H2.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Willie Nelson

H3.text: who sang the songs on walk the line. Waylon Payne

A4.text: They both performed their own vocals in the film (with their version of 'Jackson' being released as a single).

A5.text: All of Cash's vocal tracks in the film and on the accompanying soundtrack are played and sung by Phoenix.

A6.text: It featured nine songs performed by Joaquin Phoenix, four songs by Reese Witherspoon, two songs by Tyler Hilton, and one song each by Waylon Payne, Johnathan Rice, and Shooter Jennings.
